SECRET.
G.T.3930.
WAR CABINET.
PAY AND SEPARATION ALLOWANCES OF ITALIAN SOLDIERS.
Note by Mr. Balfour.
I took an opportunity of talking to Signer Orlando this morning with regard to the question of the payment of the Italian Soldiers' Separation Allowance out of British funds, as suggested in War Cabinet No. 361, Minute 7.
I gather that Signor Orlando was more or less satisfied with the position, and did not think it necessary for anything further to be done.
(Initialled) A. J. B.
FOREIGN OFFICE,
15th March, 1918.
